price: (28) And he made it[1436] a word remaining among his descendants that they might return [to it].
arabic: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةَۢ بَاقِيَةٗ فِي عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: [1436]- i.e., his testimony that none is worthy of worship except Allāh.
